ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 1 teaspoon flaked salt, divided, 2 large heirloom tomatoes, thinly sliced, 2  ripe peaches - halved, pitted, and sliced into half moons, 6 leaves fresh basil, 1 (8 ounce) ball fresh mozzarella, thinly sliced
nutrition: Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 9g 46%, Cholesterol 45mg 15%, Sodium 569mg 25%, Total Carbohydrate 8g 3%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 11g, Vitamin C 33mg 163%, Calcium 341mg 26%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 237mg 5%
